title: Borrell’s U.S. Broadside Reveals the EU Elite’s Post-National Turn
snippet: — December 12, 2025 · Josep Borrell’s latest outburst as former High Representative—accusing the United States of wanting “a white Europe divided into nations”—has triggered a political shockwave that reveals far more than he intended.
